faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing

q1.question: Can I change plans at any time?
q1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately.

q2.question: Are there any setup fees?
q2.answer: No, there are no setup fees. We handle everything for free.

q3.question: What happens if I exceed my limits?
q3.answer: We'll contact you to propose an upgrade. No service interruption.

q4.question: Do you offer volume discounts?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer preferential rates for businesses with more than 100 kiosks. Contact us.

hero.title: About KioskCraft
hero.subtitle: We're transforming the restaurant industry with innovative solutions for ordering kiosks.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description: KioskCraft was created with a simple vision: enable restaurant franchisors to perfectly control their brand identity across all their kiosks, while offering the necessary flexibility to their franchisees.
mission.value2: Custom solutions for every restaurant chain

story.title: Our story
story.subtitle: How we developed the reference SaaS solution for restaurant kiosks

step1.title: 2022 - Problem identified
step1.description: We found that franchisors struggled to maintain brand consistency across their ordering kiosks.

step2.title: 2023 - Solution development
step2.description: Creation of our multi-tenant platform with an intuitive drag & drop editor and advanced analytics tools.

step3.title: 2024 - First customers
step3.description: Successful launch with our first franchisor partners and an average 35% increase in their sales.

step4.title: Today - Market leadership
step4.description: Over 500 restaurants trust us and we continue to innovate to meet market needs.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use and protect your personal data.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content: At KioskCraft, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use and protect your information in accordance with GDPR.

data_collection.title: Data we collect
data_collection.intro: We collect the following types of data:

data_sharing.title: Data sharing
data_sharing.content: We never sell your personal data. We may share it only with our trusted partners to provide our services, and always in compliance with this policy.

security.title: Security
security.content: We use appropriate security measures to protect your data, including encryption, two-factor authentication and regular audits.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to:
rights.item3: Delete your data (right to be forgotten)
rights.item4: Object to the processing of your data

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about this policy, contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@kioskcraft.com

company.title: Company identification
company.name: Company name: KioskCraft SAS
company.form: Legal form: Simplified Joint Stock Company

director.title: Publication director
director.content: Marie Dubois, President of KioskCraft SAS

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual property
intellectual_property.content: All content on this site (texts, images, logos) is protected by copyright and belongs to KioskCraft or its partners. Any reproduction without authorization is prohibited.

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: KioskCraft strives to provide accurate information but cannot guarantee the absence of errors. Use of information is at your own risk.

applicable_law.title: Applicable law
applicable_law.content: These legal notices are governed by French law. Any dispute will be brought before the competent courts of Paris.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these legal notices, contact us at legal@kioskcraft.com

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The conditions that govern the use of the KioskCraft platform.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By using the KioskCraft platform, you fully accept these general terms of use. If you disagree, please do not use our services.

service_description.title: Service description
service_description.content: KioskCraft is a SaaS platform that allows franchisors to create and manage customized interfaces for their restaurant ordering kiosks.

user_obligations.title: User obligations
user_obligations.intro: By using our services, you agree to:
user_obligations.item3: Not use the service for illegal purposes
user_obligations.item4: Maintain the confidentiality of your credentials

payment.title: Payment terms
payment.content: Prices are shown excluding taxes. Payment is made by automatic debit according to the chosen frequency. Any payment delay may result in service suspension.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual property
intellectual_property.content: KioskCraft retains all intellectual property rights to the platform. You retain your rights to content you create with our tools.

liability.title: Limitation of liability
liability.content: KioskCraft cannot be held responsible for indirect or consequential damages resulting from platform use. Our liability is limited to the amount paid for our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the service at any time with 30 days notice. KioskCraft may terminate immediately in case of terms violation.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: KioskCraft reserves the right to modify these terms. Users will be informed of changes and must accept them to continue using the service.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, contact us at legal@kioskcraft.com
